import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Dashboard.css'; // Import Dashboard component CSS const Dashboard = () => { // Dummy data for latest orders const latestOrders = [ { id: 1, customer: 'John Doe', date: '2024-03-10', total: 150 }, { id: 2, customer: 'Jane Smith', date: '2024-03-09', total: 200 }, { id: 3, customer: 'Alice Johnson', date: '2024-03-08', total: 100 }, ]; return (

Dashboard

Total Products

100

Total Orders

50

Total Revenue

$5000

Manage Products Manage Orders

Latest Orders

    {latestOrders.map(order => (

  • Order ID: {order.id}

    Customer: {order.customer}

    Date: {order.date}

    Total: ${order.total}

    • ))}
); }; export default Dashboard;
